summary: The mage hood clips with anything that is not the mage robes. This mod tries to lessen the amount of clipping.
descriptionHtml: Be Aware that there will always be some degree of clipping because the hood is so big and floppy. I've been wanting this for awhile now but haven't found anything similar to this mod. Caliente's bodyslide 2 mod allowed me to create this. I've uploaded the .nif file for those who do not want to use bodyslide. cheers.
author: Feldspare
